column5: Hi all,   Got this at the shack the other day, (well….actually my wife caught it)     our supper plans changed on the spot………………..     WE TURNED ONE OF THESE………...          INTO SOME OF THESE……………...         With a few fries and a nice bean sprout coleslaw………..YUM!   Its been a while since we had fish.   need to get some more
I've got some cleaned fish in the freezer waiting to be turned in to the exact same yummyness.  Can't wait!  Thanks for the post.  I actually forgot I had some fillets in the freezer.
Neeeeeeed more!!  Been a while since I did a real fry...do you use a deep fryer?

Neeeeeeed more!!  Been a while since I did a real fry...do you use a deep fryer?  Yeah, a buddy of mine picked up one of these last year on sale for $40 at Menards in the USA. Its 18qt. Hook up the BBQ propane, couple 3ltr oil jugs and 20 minutes later….fish and chips. It works outside at -25C too.   [/url]
You are quite the magician turning that old fish into something delicious.   Art
you forgot to mention the beer
Looks yummy!  I'm gonna fry up some walleye.  Opps - I have to catch one first???
Need you to get one for Team 8.
Need you to get one for Team 8.  Yeah….wife got that one….but i will be sure entering one this year of at least 27"……its rare i finish a year without at least one 30" walter!
